casebody.data:
TRAIL ENTERPRISES, INC., dba Wilson Oil Company, et al., petitioners,
v.
CITY OF HOUSTON, TEXAS. No. 13-1374. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 6, 2014.

Opinion

Motion of California Independent Petroleum Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Texas, Fourteenth District, denied.
